main.Query:
declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + ']
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[tblUIDataAggregation]'') AND type in (N''U'')) DROP TABLE [dbo].[tblUIDataAggregation]
SET ANSI_NULLS ON SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON SET ANSI_PADDING ON
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[tblUIDataAggregation]( [DimPoolID] [bigint] NULL, [LTVPassNo] varchar(50) NULL, [AggregationCategory] [nvarchar](200) NULL, [AggregationItem] [nvarchar](200) NULL, [Value] [decimal](18, 3) NULL, [UnitOfMeasure] varchar(50) NULL, [FormatString] [nvarchar](100) NULL, [IsEnabled] bit NULL default 1, [AggregationID] [bigint] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT [PK_UIDataAggregation] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [AggregationID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]'
exec (@vchSQL)
